title: Water Bottle
description:
This water bottle is the ideal companion for car enthusiasts on the go. Crafted to match the high-performance spirit, this bottle ensures your drink stays cold with double-wall vacuum insulation. Crafted of kitchen grade stainless steel it will hold up for tons of hot laps. 

On-hand hydration for cold starts, morning burnouts, daily commutes, and is track ready.

  • Cupholder compatible
  • Leakproof
  • Easy to carry
  • Double-wall vacuum insulated
  • Chug cap 
  • Lid can clip or carry
  • capacity: 26oz/800ml
  • weight: 460g
  • material: inner 304ss, outer 201ss
  • surface treament: powder coated
